title: Profile
organizationsDescription: Here you can see all organizations you are linked to as a partner.
onboardingExited: You closed the bank account setup form. You can reopen it at any time.
partnerIntro: In the partner portal, you can earn commissions by referring, selling and providing support, but everything is structured in levels:
indicatorDesc: Everyone starts as a Referrer. You earn a lifetime 10% of the value of the plan that your referral contracts.
sellerDesc: After training and approval, you can become a Seller and earn an additional 10% for each sale made.
supportDesc: After training and approval for support, you earn an additional 10% for each customer you assist in post-sales.
indicationProcess: For referrals, you should briefly introduce Interflow to the client, and our sellers will contact them. If you are qualified as a seller, you can make the sale directly, as well as provide post-sale support if you are qualified.
paymentProcess: Our payment is made through automatic split, where the transfer to your account occurs automatically when the customer makes the payment, through Stripe Connect. To start receiving, configure your bank account below.
partnershipMessage: We hope to build an excellent partnership!

form.passwordRequirements: Password must be at least 6 characters long

errors.avatarTooLarge: Profile picture must be less than 2MB
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
